Notification

Rebecca has been taken away from her family by a notorious criminal that escaped prison years ago with an old running buddy who soon left him for a different life. When the family realise that their daughter has been taken they meet some old friends that they never really buried the hatchet with. Her mother gives up secrets to Rebecca, leading her to find out things that should not be revealed but that take them into a whole different world.
